Project Home: http://boip.tylerjones.me

Welcome to BarcodeOverIP for Android!
To get started you must add a server by pressing 'Menu' > 'Add Server'. Once you have added one or more servers, to scan a barcode, simply touch the desired server on the list and scan away!
To edit/remove a server, press and hold the target server in the list and a menu will appear.
 **NOTE: The server application is available on the project site and the Google Code site as well.
